Bitter Strike.name: Bitter Strike
Bitter Strike.fullText:
Siegebreaker Attack 11Bitter Strike

So fierce is your attack that your enemy panics, ignoring your allies for one disastrous moment.

Encounter        Fear, Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to all attackers until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 67.
Bitter Strike.flavor: So fierce is your attack that your enemy panics, ignoring your allies for one disastrous moment.
Bitter Strike.range:
Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to all attackers until the end of your next turn.

Shattering Blow.name: Shattering Blow
Shattering Blow.fullText:
Siegebreaker Attack 20Shattering Blow

Your weapon crashes into the foe, splitting it wide and leaving it gasping as its vitality sprays the air.

Daily        Martial, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).

  Special: If the target granted combat advantage to you, it also falls prone.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 67.
Shattering Blow.flavor: Your weapon crashes into the foe, splitting it wide and leaving it gasping as its vitality sprays the air.
Shattering Blow.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

  Special: If the target granted combat advantage to you, it also falls prone.

Brutal Momentum.name: Brutal Momentum
Brutal Momentum.fullText:
Siegebreaker Utility 12Brutal Momentum

Your attacks fall with such fury that your enemy cannot possibly defend against them all.

Encounter        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with an at-will attack power using a two-handed weapon, your next attack against that enemy gains +2 power bonus to the attack roll.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 67.
Brutal Momentum.flavor: Your attacks fall with such fury that your enemy cannot possibly defend against them all.

Personal
